attributes.action: Get British Basketball on British TV!
attributes.additional_details:
We believe that Basketball in Britain lacks significant coverage on British television.

Increasing interest in the sport, from grassroots to professional level, signifies the growing demand for basketball broadcasting on television. Certainly with the Olympics right around the corner, what better way to introduce the British public to one of the worlds' most popular and widely viewed sports?

This petition thereby calls for and supports bringing BBL (British Basketball League) games back to terrestrial TV.
